about_the_game:
-Must own at least one episode from Batman: The Enemy Within - The Telltale Series to use this add-on.

The Batman - The Enemy Within Shadows Mode brings a captivating new look to the storied Telltale Batman games. Enhanced with hand recolored gameplay and remastered textures, replay your favorite Telltale Batman episodes and experience the twisted world of the Dark Knight in a sinister, new way.

content_descriptors.notes: This is the add-on on for The Enemy Within, a Telltale series that has strong violence, suggestive themes and strong language.
